text: Ðis synt ða landgemæro ðara X hyda.
Ærest of eoppan wyllan broc<../images/tbar.gif>on ða blacan wyllan<../images/tbar.gif>of blacan wyllan on ðone heafodæcre.

Of ðan æcre &lang gemærrees on hæslburh middeweardre of hæslbyrg on hæslford &lang streames on ðone ealdan ford of ðan forda a be gemære<../images/tbar.gif>on ða stræt of ðære stræt on ðone lægæcer of ðam lægæcer a be gemære<../images/tbar.gif>on ðone hrigcweg.

Of ðam hricwege be gemære<../images/tbar.gif>on ða ealdan dic &lang dices on landgares brigce of ðære brigce ongean stream<../images/tbar.gif>on cærswyllan broc of ðam broce on fule wyllan of ðam wille be gemære on scearpannæsse a be gemære<../images/tbar.gif>on ðone steort.
Of ðam steort on ða stræt &lang stræt on hunburgleah of ðære leah<../images/tbar.gif>eft on eoppan willan broc.
Ðis synton ða landgemæro æt þo V hidyn in Tademærton.
Ærest of Eadwardes mylne<../images/tbar.gif>on ða ealdan dic on mærbroc.
Of mærstane on ðone ealdan garan.
Of ðan garan a be heafdan<../images/tbar.gif>on ðone broc of ðan broce ongean stream<../images/tbar.gif>on<../images/tbar.gif>risc bed.

<../images/tbar.gif>on ðone peg<../images/tbar.gif>suð &lang weges<../images/tbar.gif>on<../images/tbar.gif>slæd<../images/tbar.gif>of ðan slæde up on þa ecge<../images/tbar.gif>&lang ecge on heortwyllan.
Of heortwyllan on ða ealdan stige<../images/tbar.gif>andlang styge on ðone mærpit.
Of þam pitte on wilbaldes ecge of wilbaldes ecge<../images/tbar.gif>eft on eadwardes mylne.
Ðis synt þa landgemæro to oþer V hidin.
Æræst on halhford<../images/tbar.gif>&lang woburnan<../images/tbar.gif>on eoppan welles stream<../images/tbar.gif>up ongean stream on sandford.
Of sandforda on be gemære<../images/tbar.gif>on ða heaford stoccas.
Of þan stoccan on ðone mærstan of ðan mærstan o be gemære<../images/tbar.gif>on landgares bicge.
